医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
探索 G:Box 和高质量成像在本次采访中，News Medical 与 Synoptics 的 Martin Biggs 博士讨论了 Syngene 的 G:Box，这是一种高质量的成像和凝胶记录系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Exploring-the-GBox-and-for-high-quality-imaging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Exploring-the-GBox-and-for-high-quality-imaging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b45662ff-7d89-4924-8e69-2f4706720c7f Tue, 05 Nov 2024 05:06:00 -0500 Exploring the G:Box and for high-quality imaging
塑造可持续饮食：英国研究发现较小份量是减少肉类摄入量的关键英国肉类消费量的下降是由较小的份量推动的，这表明改善公共健康和环境的有效策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Shaping-sustainable-diets-UK-study-finds-that-smaller-portions-are-key-to-reducing-meat-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Shaping-sustainable-diets-UK-study-finds-that-smaller-portions-are-key-to-reducing-meat-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=171a6af5-9155-4a09-9141-460489f255db Tue, 05 Nov 2024 04:58:00 -0500 Shaping sustainable diets: U.K. study finds that smaller portions are key to reducing meat intake
研究发现定期体力活动可延缓 2 型糖尿病患者的生物衰老定期的身体活动对于减缓 2 型糖尿病的生物衰老至关重要，并确定了最佳健康益处的特定阈值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-finds-regular-physical-activity-slows-biological-aging-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-finds-regular-physical-activity-slows-biological-aging-in-type-2-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecbb29c0-1fed-4cc7-b2c6-c186252e10c9 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 04:25:00 -0500 Study finds regular physical activity slows biological aging in type 2 diabetes patients
人工智能驱动的心电图模型精确预测心脏病风险新型人工智能增强型心电图模型 AIRE 可准确预测死亡率和心脏病风险，为临床医生提供可操作的、针对患者的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/AI-powered-ECG-model-predicts-heart-disease-risk-with- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/AI-powered-ECG-model-predicts-heart-disease-risk-with- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78fb0a05-301e-4c35-b225-61f51c89b2b3 Tue, 05 Nov 2024 00:28:00 -0500 AI-powered ECG model predicts heart disease risk with precision
研究将稳定的睡眠模式与成功衰老联系起来一项新的研究发现，稳定的睡眠模式可以促进中国老年人的成功老龄化，而不稳定或睡眠不足会降低中国老年人的健康老龄化结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-links-stable-sleep-patterns-to-successful-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241105/Study-links-stable-sleep-patterns-to-successful-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4484a7f3-5525-49ca-8e7b-c82bc359989a Tue, 05 Nov 2024 00:06:00 -0500 Study links stable sleep patterns to successful aging
研究：医疗补助豁免对阿片类药物过量危机的影响有限几代人以来，联邦政府基本上没有为大型住宅设施的心理健康和药物滥用治疗付费。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-Medicaid-waivers-have-limited-impact-on-opioid-overdose-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-Medicaid-waivers-have-limited-impact-on-opioid-overdose-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89f2d39f-a4a4-46b0-b955-7f6350793abf Mon, 04 Nov 2024 23:42:38 -0500 Study: Medicaid waivers have limited impact on opioid overdose crisis
新的阿尔茨海默病指南重点关注健康成年人的风险，而不是诊断国际工作组的研究人员建议将生物标志物呈阳性、认知正常的个体归类为患有阿尔茨海默病的“风险”，以避免不必要的诊断并强调预防性护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-Alzheimers-guidelines-focus-on-risk-not-diagnosis-in-healthy-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-Alzheimers-guidelines-focus-on-risk-not-diagnosis-in-healthy-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aad8ec0c-da4e-465c-a605-821334587180 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 23:33:00 -0500 New Alzheimer's guidelines focus on risk, not diagnosis, in healthy adults
德克萨斯大学达拉斯分校的研究人员获得 NIH 370 万美元的资助用于大脑衰老研究德克萨斯大学达拉斯分校生命长寿中心 (CVL) 的两名研究人员获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的五年资助，用于通过使用强大的高分辨率成像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/UT-Dallas-researchers-awarded-2437-million-NIH-grant-for-brain-aging-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/UT-Dallas-researchers-awarded-2437-million-NIH-grant-for-brain-aging-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7fafe9a-646d-42f1-88d3-f5c2b1ffa0fe Mon, 04 Nov 2024 23:30:34 -0500 UT Dallas researchers awarded $3.7 million NIH grant for brain aging study
教育、财富和工作类型塑造衰老的大脑和认知健康社会经济因素，包括财富、教育和职业，会显着影响认知健康，影响向痴呆或认知障碍的转变以及康复的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Education-wealth-and-job-type-shape-aging-brains-and-cognitive-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Education-wealth-and-job-type-shape-aging-brains-and-cognitive-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ef13df8-85c3-45a9-93b6-1743984e2c5c Mon, 04 Nov 2024 23:13:00 -0500 Education, wealth, and job type shape aging brains and cognitive health
久坐可能加速年轻人衰老科罗拉多大学博尔德分校和加州大学河滨分校的最新研究表明，在长途通勤、繁忙的工作日和晚上的流媒体和滚动浏览之间，千禧一代现在每周坐着的时间超过 60 个小时，这可能会增加他们患心脏病的风险，并加速其他衰老迹象。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Long-sitting-hours-could-accelerate-aging-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Long-sitting-hours-could-accelerate-aging-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f612a427-8d28-48d4-912d-04e50d1a2044 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 23:12:01 -0500 Long sitting hours could accelerate aging in young adults
